entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
